name: Azazel (Mutant)
description: A mutant from biblical times, Azazel is the ruler of the Neyaphem and claims that the Earth and everything on it belongs to him.

X-MEN FIRST CLASS: THE HIGH HAND (2011) #1

wiki.aliases: Beelzebub, Satan, Duma, Keriel, Mastema, Beliar, Gadreel, numerous others
wiki.relatives: Kurt Wagner ([[Nightcrawler]], son), Nils Styger ([[Abyss]], son), [[Kiwi Black]] (son), numberous other offspring (deceased)
wiki.powers: Azazel can [[Glossary:T#teleport|teleport]] by opening a portal into another [[Glossary:D#dimension|dimension]], traveling through it, and returning via another portal back to his originating dimension. While in this other dimension, Azazel can manipulate its energies to open small viewing portals to [[Earth]] or generate devastating energy blasts. Azazel shares a mental bond with his offspring via which he can control their minds to a limited degree. An extremely long-lived mutant.
wiki.abilities: He can appear human, has a vast knowledge of dark magic.
wiki.weapons: Azazel is also a master swordsman.
wiki.bio_text: A [[Mutants|mutant]] from biblical times, Azazel is the ruler of the [[Neyaphem]] and claims that the [[Earth]] and everything on it belongs to him. To save humanity from persecution and death by Azazel, the [[angels]] banished him to the Brimstone dimension. Only able to leave this [[Glossary:D#dimension|dimension]] for short amounts of time, he fathered many children throughout the Earth; [[Nightcrawler]] being one of them.
wiki.bio:
A [[Mutants|mutant]] from biblical times, Azazel is the ruler of the [[Neyaphem]] and claims that the [[Earth]] and everything on it belongs to him. To save humanity from persecution and death by Azazel, the [[angels]] banished him to the Brimstone dimension. Only able to leave this [[Glossary:D#dimension|dimension]] for short amounts of time, he fathered many children throughout the Earth; [[Nightcrawler]] being one of them.

Using his mental link with his children and bringing them all to one place, the place of his banishment, Azazel was able to open a portal to the brimstone dimension. Before he could finish, the [[X-Men]] arrived and a fight ensued with the X-Men being trapped in Azazel's dimension. With the help of [[Polaris]] and Azazel, all the X-Men escaped back to the real world.
